senses.definition: 數學上未知數符號 (mathematical symbol for an unknown term)
senses.label: 語素

senses.definition: 表示錯誤 (mark that signifies a mistake)
用嚟過濾粗口字嘅字 (used in place of a vulgar word; used for redacting a word)
倍數 (multiplier)
強調、加強語氣咁表達「就係咁喇」 (emphasised form of "exactly")
senses.label: 副詞

senses.definition: 未有內容 NO DATA
數學嘅#積分 ((mathematics) integration)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: in1 x ji6 ci3 dang2 jyu1 x saam1 ci3 ou1 faa4 saam1.
examples.translation: The integral of x² is x³/3.

senses.definition: 投入、沉迷 (be into something)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: gin3 dou2 keoi5 hou2 in6 tu6 ni1 gin6 si6 jap6 min6.
examples.translation: I can tell that he's really into this matter.

senses.definition: 入境處或其他地方主管移民、出入境事項嘅部門 (The Immigration Department, Immigration Office, etc.)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 活動（量詞：單／場） (event; a planned public or social occasion)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我遲啲想搞個聯校event，你點睇？
examples.jyutping: ngo5 ci4 di1 soeng2 gaau2 go3 lyun4 haau6 i6 fen1, nei5 dim2 tai2?
examples.translation: I'd like to hold an inter-school event. What do you think?

senses.definition: 寄電子郵件、傳電子訊息；尤其指#社交媒體 嘅私人信息，相對於公開嘅留言或#post (to email; to send an electronic message)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢好好人，inbox問佢功課一定會覆。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 hou2 hou2 jan4, in1 boks1 man6 keoi5 gung1 fo3 jat1 ding6 wui5 fuk1
examples.translation: He's very kind; if you DM him a task, he'll always reply.

senses.definition: 收電子郵件或私人訊息嘅空間 (inbox, a place that stores incoming emails or messages)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 佢得罪咗網民，而家日日俾人炸inbox。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 dak1 zeoi6 zo2 mong5 man4, ji4 gaa1 jat6 jat6 bei2 jan4 zaa3 in1 boks1.
examples.translation: He offended other users and now his inbox gets blown up by them every day.

senses.definition: 時尚；形容一個年紀較大嘅人知道年紀較細嘅人之間流行嘅嘢 (fashionable; up-to-date; in)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 你阿媽聽緊最新嘅歌喎，乜佢咁in㗎？
examples.jyutping: nei5 aa3 maa1 teng1 gan2 zeoi3 san1 ge3 go1 wo3, mat1 keoi5 gam3 in1 gaa4?
examples.translation: Wow, your mom is listening to the latest songs. I didn't know that she is in the swim!

senses.definition: 舉行#面試，接見面試者 (to interview)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 參與面試 (to be interviewed)

examples.jyutping: nei5 gam1 jat6 in1 seng4 dim2 aa3?

phonetic.original: ik1 sou1 zoeng3:ik1 si4 ou1 zoeng3

senses.definition: 調味料，主要用蝦乾、乾瑤柱、金華火腿等#乾貨，再混入辣油、紹興酒、蠔油、豆瓣醬等#調味料 製成 (XO sauce; a sauce comprised of dried shrimp, dried scallop, Jinhua ham, chili oil, etc.)
senses.label: 名詞

keywords: ik1 sou1 zoeng3:ik1 si4 ou1 zoeng3

senses.definition: 一種#毒品，屬於#興奮劑，學名係亞甲二氧基甲基安非他明 (MDMA; Ecstasy)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 本身指最高級嘅白蘭地(eXtra Old)，亦借指頂級質素嘅產物。 (the highest-grade Brandy, Extra Old; figuratively, the product with top rank quality)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 實習生、見習生嘅英文；學習、訓練當中嘅非正式短期員工（量詞：個） (intern)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: ni1 go3 in1 toeng2 hok6 je5 hou2 faai3.
examples.translation: This intern is a quick learner.

senses.definition: 得戚；態度囂張；係將#寸 翻譯做英文嘅講法 (arrogant; a backward translation of #寸 cyun4 which also means "inch")
senses.label: 形容詞
